# ðŸš€ Feature Request

### Description
https://github.com/eth-clients/holesky
[note from parithosh](https://twitter.com/parithosh_j/status/1689753694487646208?s=46&t=FV26h3b9hzTKb_ndd2zkow)

holesky is a new ethereum testnet to be launched around sept15th,2023 and will be the future replacement of goerli. 
Prysm should natively support this testnet and update required items around supporting it

Holesky Testnet 
- [ ] update Prysm documents
- [ ] add native holesky testnet flags to appropriate services
- [ ] make sure to have some testnet eth on hand...
